note.p: Daughter of Millicent and John Gisborne, and granddaughter (by her first marriage) of Elizabeth Darwin, Erasmus Darwin’s second wife. Married Henry Nixon (1805/6–35), incumbent of Astbury, Cheshire, and later Boroughbridge, Yorkshire, in 1834.
Derbyshire, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 1 October 2018)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 October 2018)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 October 2018)
